title: UFC on ESPN+ 19 preview with Anthony Smith: Jedrzejczyk-Waterson, Swanson-Gracie, more
text:
TAMPA, Fla. – UFC on ESPN+ 19 goes down Saturday, and the 14-fight card is filled with interesting fights and compelling storylines.

Much of the focus, of course, is on the main event between strawweight contenders Joanna Jedrzejczyk (15-3 MMA, 9-3 UFC) and Michelle Waterson (17-6 MMA, 5-2 UFC), but the co-main event between Cub Swanson (25-11 MMA, 10-7 UFC) and Kron Gracie (5-0 MMA, 1-0 UFC) is getting its fair share of attention, too.

UFC on ESPN+ 19 takes place at Amalie Center with the entire event set to stream on ESPN+.

To get insight into all the storylines around Jedrzejczyk vs. Waterson, Swanson vs. Gracie and more, watch the video above as MMA Junkie senior reporter Mike Bohn and UFC light heavyweight contender/ESPN analyst Anthony Smith preview the event.
description: The UFC light heavyweight previews the top storylines around Jedrzejczyk vs. Waterson and more at UFC Tampa with MMA Junkie's Mike Bohn.
